compliant.section:
二、 個資使用範圍
神腦生活為了提供會員完整良好的購物過程，將請會員於訂購時，填寫本服務所需之相關資料；除另有規定外，因此所取得會員個人資料，神腦生活僅作為會員所需的個別服務為主。
compliant.legal provisions: Data minimization, Purpose limitation: Collecting data only for specified, explicit and legitimate purposes.

compliant.section:
三、 個資使用期間
神腦生活為提供會員更好之服務品質，將會在法令使用或會員同意下，將會員資料提供給合作之商品供應商、商品配送物流商或其關係企業，以提供相關保固服務、行銷及優惠訊息。神腦生活將持續使用會員所提供個人資料，直至會員提出停止使用。
compliant.legal provisions: Lawfulness of processing: Processing is lawful with consent, Legal basis for processing: Consent for marketing and offers,  Right to withdraw consent.

compliant.section:
六、 個資之查詢、更正及調閱等事項
會員有權閱覽、查詢、補充或修改個人會員帳戶資料，神腦生活會不定期發送行銷訊息，會員可選擇取消訂閱相關訊息。
compliant.legal provisions: Right of access, Right to rectification, Right to object

non_compliant.section:
三、 本政策之適用
隱私權政策聲明適用於神腦生活及神腦門市，及其延伸服務網站活動時，所涉及的個人資料之收集、運用與保護。但不適用於您經由本網站搜尋連結至其他網站後，所進行之活動，關於您在其他網站的個人資料之保護，適用各該網站的隱私權保護政策。對於不屬於神腦生活之網站或網頁，均與神腦生活無關。
non_compliant.amend: While this section clarifies the scope of the policy, it does not explicitly mention the territorial scope, which is crucial for GDPR compliance as it applies to data processing of individuals in the EU, regardless of the company's location.

non_compliant.section:
四、 cookie之運用
我們將會記錄 Cookie 資訊，包含您來自的網域名稱、IP 位址、使用的設備、作業系統版本、瀏覽器等資訊，以提供個人化服務，並優化使用者體驗。這些資訊不涉及您的個⼈⾝分資料，僅⽤於進⾏數據性的統計分析，作為改進我們的系統、網站、服務、產品、廣告之⽤。
non_compliant.legal provisions: Data Minimisation: IP addresses can be considered personal data. The policy should specify the exact purpose and legal basis for collecting this data and whether it's aggregated or pseudonymized.  Conditions for consent: The policy should clearly state that users have the right to refuse cookies and how they can do so.
non_compliant.amend: Amend this section to explicitly state that IP addresses are considered personal data and explain the specific purpose and legal basis for their collection. Clarify whether IP addresses are processed in a way that constitutes personal data (e.g., aggregated or pseudonymized).  Clearly state that users have the right to refuse cookies and explain how they can manage or opt out of cookies.

non_compliant.section:
五、 個資安全注意事項
神腦生活將謹慎的保護會員個人資料，會員有責任保護帳號密碼的機密性，避免會員的帳號密碼遭有心人士盜用，除非經您的同意、依法律之規定，或本服務銷售(行銷)等目的用途外，絕不會將會員的個人資料透漏予任何與神腦無關之第三人。
non_compliant.amend: While this section mentions consent and legal obligations, it lacks specificity regarding the legal basis for processing data for sales and marketing purposes.  It should clearly state the legal basis (e.g., legitimate interest) and provide options for users to opt-out of such processing.

non_compliant.section: 神腦生活保有權利向會員傳送服務相關特定訊息(服務通知、訊息)，若會員不願接收前述訊息，請與客服中心聯絡申請，但該會員帳號可能將無法享受完整服務，或完全無法使用該項服務。
non_compliant.amend: Making service access conditional on consent to receive marketing messages is not compliant.  The policy should clearly differentiate between service-related and marketing communications, ensuring users can opt-out of marketing messages without impacting their access to core services.

non_compliant.section:
七、 本政策之修訂
神腦生活隱私權保護政策將因應需求，隨時進行修正，以落實保障使用者隱私權之立意。修正後的條款將刊登於本網站上，不另行個別通知，您可於神腦生活網站上詳閱修訂隱私權聲明及相關告知事項。
non_compliant.amend: GDPR requires explicit and informed consent for any data processing.  Silently updating the policy and assuming consent by continued use of the website is insufficient. Users should be actively informed about changes to the policy and their right to withdraw consent.

non_compliant.section:
五、 個資安全注意事項
神腦生活將謹慎的保護會員個人資料，會員有責任保護帳號密碼的機密性，避免會員的帳號密碼遭有心人士盜用，除非經您的同意、依法律之規定，或本服務銷售(行銷)等目的用途外，絕不會將會員的個人資料透漏予任何與神腦無關之第三人。
non_compliant.legal provisions: Data minimization, Purpose limitation, Security of processing
non_compliant.amend: This section, while addressing data security, lacks specifics regarding the company's data protection measures. It should detail the technical and organizational measures implemented to ensure data security, aligning with Article 32 of the GDPR.
